src:
Atlet Tenis Putra Sampang Juara Ajang Internasional
05 Nov 2019, 06:33 by Famelia



Atlet Tenis Putra Sampang Juara Ajang Internasional



Atlet Tenis Putra Sampang Juara Ajang Internasional



Atlet Tenis Putra Sampang Juara Ajang Internasional


KBRN, Sampang : Indonesia patut berbangga setelah petenis putra dan putrinya berhasil meraih gelar juara di ajang Amman Mineral International Junior Championships 2019.
Petenis putra kategori tunggal yang mengangkat trofi adalah Gunawan Trismuwantara, sedangkan putri adalah Nadya Dhaneswara.
Pada laga final turnamen yang digelar di lapangan tenis Elite Club Epicentrum Jakarta, Remaja asal Kabupaten Sampang, Madura  Gunawan  sukses mengangkat piala setelah memenangi laga All Indonesian Final usai unggul straight set atas kompatriotnya, Lucky Candra Kurniawan.
Ketua Bidang Prestasi Persatuan Tenis Lapangan Indonesia (Pelti) Sampang Moh. Mas’udi mengaku bangga atas prestasi luar biasa yang diraih atlet binaannya itu.
Menurutnya selain menjuarai di kategori tunggal, Gugun sapaan akrab Gunawan ketika berpasangan dengan atlet dari Thailand di kategori double juga menduduki peringkat ke 2.
Juara dua diraih setelah dikalahkan pasangan atlet India dan Industan.
Selain Gunawan, tambah Mas’udi, dua atlet Kota Bahari juga terjun dalam kejuaraan yang sama, yakni Ari Fahrezi dan Ali Akbar.
Namun Ari Fahrezi dan Ali Akbar ketika turun di kategori single hanya berada di peringkat ke 8, dan di kategori double keduanya ketika berpasangan meraih juara tiga.
“Tentunya prestasi atlet tenis ini sangat membanggakan bagi Kabupaten Sampang. Karena kejuaraan yang dijuarai merupakan kejuaraan tingkat International yang diikuti oleh atlet dari beberapa Negara,”Ujar Mas’udi Binpres Pelti Sampang Moh. Mas’udi Selasa (05/11/2019)
Mas’udi berharap, prestasi tiga atletnya itu dapat meningkat, dan jangan pernah mengenal lelah dalam berlatih, selalu menjaga pola makan, dan juga dapat mencari ilmu dengan para pemain senior.
Disamping itu dukungan dari para orang tua juga harus lebih dimaksiamalkan. (Famelia)
text:
Sampang Men's Tennis Athlete Champion International Event
05 Nov 2019, 06:33 by Famelia



Sampang Men's Tennis Athlete Champion International Event



Sampang Men's Tennis Athlete Champion International Event



Sampang Men's Tennis Athlete Champion International Event


KBRN, Sampang: Indonesia should be proud after the male and female tennis players won the Amman Mineral International Junior Championships 2019 event.
The only male category to lift the trophy is Gunawan Trismuwantara, while the female is Nadya Dhaneswara.
In the final match of the tournament which was held on the Elite Club Epicentrum tennis court in Jakarta, Youth from Sampang Regency, Madura Gunawan successfully lifted the trophy after winning the All Indonesian Final match after winning a straight set over his compatriot, Lucky Candra Kurniawan.
Chairman of the Indonesian Field Tennis Association (Pelti) Achievement in Sampang Moh. Mas'udi claimed to be proud of the extraordinary achievement achieved by the fostered athlete.
According to him, in addition to winning in the single category, Gugun Gunawan's familiar greeting when paired with athletes from Thailand in the double category also ranked second.
The second winner was won after being defeated by Indian and Indian athletes.
Aside from Gunawan, added Mas'udi, two Maritime City athletes also entered the same championship, namely Ari Fahrezi and Ali Akbar.
But Ari Fahrezi and Ali Akbar when dropped in the singles category only ranked 8th, and in the double category both when the pair won third place.
"Certainly the achievements of these tennis athletes are very encouraging for Sampang Regency. Because the championship won is an international level championship which is participated by athletes from several countries, "said Mas'udi Binpres Pelti Sampang Moh. Mas'udi Tuesday (11/05/2019)
Mas'udi hopes that the achievements of the three athletes can improve, and never get tired of practicing, always maintain their diet, and can also seek knowledge with senior players.
Besides that, support from parents must also be more practiced. (Famelia)
